data.prayer: Pour your Spirit out on the 422,000 citizens of Qujing, Yunnan, China, so that they might know your name and the name of your Son.
data.verse: And afterward, I will pour out my Spirit on all people. your sons and daughters will prophesy, your old men will dream dreams, your young men will see visions.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Qujing, Yunnan, China
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Jesus, like with the centurion who came to you for his sick servant, please call into your house those who have great faith but are not yet yours in the county of Qujing
data.verse: When Jesus heard these things, he marveled at him, and turning to the crowd that followed him, said, “I tell you, not even in Israel have I found such faith.” And when those who had been sent returned to the house, they found the servant well.

data.prayer: Spirit, give faith and responsive hearts to the 422,000 citizens of the the county of Qujing.
data.verse: Seek the Lord while he may be found; call upon him while he is near.

data.prayer: Lord, you already know the names of the prophets you want to raise up in Qujing. Please, raise them up and give them the courage to speak your truth to your church.
data.verse: Before I formed you in the womb I knew you, and before you were born I consecrated you; I appointed you a prophet to the nations.

data.prayer: Spirit, I pray that the Aling people will come and worship before you, Lord. May they glorify your name for you are great.
Father, please send new apostles into the harvest, who can open up new communities for the gospel in the county of Qujing, Yunnan, China.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Jesus, make yourself known to the 422,000 people living in Qujing through the internet today.
data.verse: They have no speech, they use no words; no sound is heard from them. Yet their voice goes out into all the earth, their words to the ends of the world. In the heavens God has pitched a tent for the sun.

data.section_summary:
the county of Qujing, Yunnan, China has a population of 422,000.

We estimate Qujing has 32,013 people who might know Jesus, 6,817 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 383,169 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 13 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Jesus, help the church in the county of Qujing to not rely on buildings or programs, but on your Spirit and the simple faithfulness of every believer.
